mapper.select: select *from (select P.*, rownum R from (select * from (select A.*,B.pro_main from product A, images B where A.pro_num=B.pro_num ) order by pro_num desc)P) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}

select *from (select V.*, rownum R from (select * from review
order by rev_num desc )V) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
select *from review order by rev_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into review(id, pro_num, rev_num,star,name,help,rev_date) values( #{id},#{pro_num},rev_seq.nextval,#{star},#{name},#{help},sysdate)
